analysis.key_quote: Reclassifying the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH, and thus reduce public trust in Federally-funded science.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the NIH and its negative impact on public trust in science, which aligns with the themes of politicization and scientific integrity.
